body:
Hello my dear Avicans.

 So yesterday I took it upon my self to do a challenge that I was very excited to record! The Fist challenge.  So you log onto Nexus and run around killing as many people as you can with only your fist, sounds dumb but it was really fun and I encourage all of you to try it out, test your PVP skills!
Apology for the lag, my internet isn't good at the moment!

Watch my video ☛ http://youtu.be/4zW-AqfvXyg
Watch my video ☛ http://youtu.be/4zW-AqfvXyg
Watch my video ☛ http://youtu.be/4zW-AqfvXyg

Show some love, slap that like button and share it with your friends! <3

VIEWING RECOMMENDATIONS
[✔] 1080p quality
[✔] 50% audio
[✔] Fullscreen
